titles.title: Providing amounts for the expenses of the Committee on Science, Space, and Technology in the One Hundred Seventeenth Congress.
Providing amounts for the expenses of the Committee on Science, Space, and Technology in the One Hundred Seventeenth Congress.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

term.name: House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology

bill.summary: This resolution provides amounts for the expenses of the House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology for the 117th Congress.
